column4: Can someone point me to a dash-like application for Gnome - a quick launcher for applications based on typing and navigating with the keyboard?
in fact one reason I'm not using Unity is the annoying dock
i'm looking into gnome do, but based on descriptions it does more that applications - indexes files too and i don't need that.
it's actually quite a nice feature
Well I think awn is the best dock out there
why did you not tell me about this beforehand?!
is there a way to remove the huge icon though?
I think you can get other themes for it somewhere...Google
